verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H1696>tell<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> and will <S%H2388>hold<s%> them <S%H5750>still,<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is on your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> on the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> on the <S%H2543>asses,<s%> on the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> on the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and on the <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1698>murrain.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6395>sever<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that is the <S%H1121>children's<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H4150>set<s%> time, <S%H559>saying,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that <S%H1697>thing<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died:<s%> but of the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> not <S%H259>one.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was not <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H4191>dead.<s%> And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H3515>hardened,<s%> and he did not let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> to you <S%H4393>handfuls<s%> <S%H2651><s%> of <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and let <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> it toward the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> small <S%H80>dust<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and shall be a <S%H7822>boil<s%> <S%H6524>breaking<s%> forth with <S%H76>blains<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>beast,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6368>ashes<s%> of the <S%H3536>furnace,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> it up toward <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H7822>boil<s%> <S%H6524>breaking<s%> forth with <S%H76>blains<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7822>boils;<s%> for the <S%H7822>boil<s%> was on the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and he <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7925>Rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

For I will at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4046>plagues<s%> on your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and on your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> me in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H6258>now<s%> I will <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that I may <S%H5221>smite<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and you shall be <S%H3582>cut<s%> off from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And in <S%H199>very<s%> <S%H199>deed<s%> for <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5668>cause<s%> have I <S%H5975>raised<s%> you up, for to <S%H7200>show<s%> in you my <S%H3581>power;<s%> and that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H5608>declared<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
As <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5549>exalt<s%> you yourself against my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you will not let them <S%H7971>go?<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as has not <S%H1961>been<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> thereof even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now.<s%>

<S%H7971>Send<s%> therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> and <S%H5756>gather<s%> your <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have in the <S%H7704>field;<s%> for on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and shall not be <S%H622>brought<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> the <S%H1259>hail<s%> shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on them, and they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

He that <S%H3373>feared<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> among the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> made his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>houses:<s%>
And he that <S%H3820>regarded<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and his <S%H4735>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> forth your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that there may be <S%H1259>hail<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>beast,<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> throughout the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1980>ran<s%> along on the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H1259>hail<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

So there was <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>mingled<s%> with the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as there was <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H227>since<s%> it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H7535>Only<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were, was there <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1259>hail.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> this <S%H6471>time:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and I and my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

<S%H6279>Entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> (for it is <S%H7227>enough)<s%> that there be <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>thunder<s%> and <S%H1259>hail;<s%> and I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and you shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>longer.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, As soon as I am <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H6566>abroad<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunder<s%> shall <S%H2308>cease,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1259>hail;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that the <S%H776>earth<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>
But as for you and your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you will not <S%H2962>yet<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
And the <S%H6594>flax<s%> and the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was <S%H5221>smitten:<s%> for the <S%H8184>barley<s%> was in the <S%H24>ear,<s%> and the <S%H6594>flax<s%> was in <S%H1392>bloom.<s%>
But the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and the <S%H3698>rye<s%> were not <S%H5221>smitten:<s%> for they were not <S%H648>grown<s%> up.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H6566>abroad<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1259>hail<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> and the <S%H4306>rain<s%> was not <S%H5413>poured<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4306>rain<s%> and the <S%H1259>hail<s%> and the <S%H6963>thunders<s%> were <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> yet <S%H3254>more,<s%> and <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> he and his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> would he let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
